{{cpp/memory/synchronized_pool_resource/title|do_deallocate}}
{{cpp/memory/synchronized_pool_resource/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++17|1=
virtual void do_deallocate( void* p, std::size_t bytes, std::size_t alignment );
}}

Returns the memory at {{c|p}} to the pool. It is unspecified if or under what circumstances this operation will result in a call to {{tt|deallocate()}} on the upstream memory resource.

=== Exceptions ===
Throws nothing.
